Requirements

Project Background

Moorfields eye Hospital is a specialist NHS eye hospital in London.

Pain points

1. Too much information present at once
2. It’s time consuming to book an appointment
3. Ocularists can’t edit spreadsheets at once without overwriting each others changes.

Solutions

1. we implement filter, search and expanding window functionality so ocularists can only see the information that they want to see
2.system will manage database rather than the ocularist, this means triaging patients will no longer be a tedious process
3. implementing synchronisation between the ocularists will lead to less frustration when trying to edit the patients information
